charinfo.name: Jiraiya
charinfo.description: One of the three sannins, Jiraiya is a perverted frog hermit who travels the world in search of some sort of knowledge. Using numerous frog based summons, Jiraiya can greatly hinder his enemies all while setting them ablaze.

abilities.name: Great Spitting Fireball
abilities.description: Jiraiya spits out a large amount of fire, dealing 20 damage to one enemy, and 10 to all others.

abilities.name: Summoning: Toad Mouth Bind
abilities.description: Jiraiya summons the stomach of a giant toad, placing all characters within it. For 2 turns, enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and during this time if Jiraiya or one of his allies is damaged with a new non-affliction skill, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Major Summoning: Gamabunta
abilities.description: Jiraiya summons the great toad Gamabunta, who deals 25 affliction damage to the enemy team. For the rest of the game, the enemy team will receive an additional 5 damage from affliction skills and this skill will be replaced by 'Toad Oil Flame Bullet'.

abilities.name: Toad Oil Flame Bullet
abilities.description: Gamabunta spits even more oil at the enemy team, followed by Jiraiya spitting fire at them , dealing 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Spiked Budha
abilities.description: This skill makes Jiraiya invulnerable for 1 turn.
